properties.name: user-manager.auth.jwt.private-key.algorithm
properties.description: Here you can set the algorithm which the private key supports.

properties.name: user-manager.auth.jwt.private-key.location
properties.description: Here you can set the path where the private key can be found in the classpath.

properties.name: user-manager.auth.jwt.public-key.algorithm
properties.description: Here you can set the algorithm which the public key supports.

properties.name: user-manager.auth.jwt.public-key.location
properties.description: Here you can set the path where the public key can be found in the classpath.
